P(A \mid B) = \frac{P(B \mid A) \, P(A)}{P(B)}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[915414c73d7f33b29735bdbc61a8abba]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={139}
P(c \mid x_1, x_2, ... x_n) = \frac{P(x_1,x_2, ... x_n \mid c) \, P(c)}{P(x_1,x_2, ... x_n)}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={169}

%mdk-data-line={174}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[71b91f52921236d0e2b3c8ed7e65b48f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={177}
P(x_1, ... x_n \mid c) = P(x_1|c)⋅P(x_2|c)⋅⋅⋅P(x_n|c)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[6b139d143514d13fafd495978336fa1b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={187}
P(c = j \mid x_1, ... x_n) = P(x_1|c = i)⋅P(x_2|c = i)⋅⋅⋅P(x_n|c = i) P(c = j)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\int_{-\infty}^\infty e^{-a x^2} d x = \sqrt{\frac{\pi}{a}}
